release.notes:
This version has the same label designs as [url=https://www.discogs.com/release/395081]another[/url], except this one does not have the "℗ 1987 International Record Syndicate, Inc." credit in the center of the Side 1 label.

Includes printed inner sleeve.

Recorded Facility: Sound Emporium, Nashville.
Mixing Facility: Master Control, Los Angeles.
